import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import InputLabel from '@mui/material/InputLabel'; import MenuItem from '@mui/material/MenuItem'; import FormControl from '@mui/material/FormControl'; import Select from '@mui/material/Select'; import TextField from '@mui/material/TextField'; import { useAutocomplete } from '@mui/core/AutocompleteUnstyled'; import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles'; import { Button } from '@mui/material'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; const BookingForm = () => { setName(event.target.value)} variant="outlined" /> Location Purpose of WFO How many days do you want to WFO {groupedOptions.length > 0 ? ( {groupedOptions.map((option, index) => (
  • {option.title}
    • ))}     ) : null} Vaccinated ?
    } export default BookingForm
